articles.description: Yulu, an electric two-wheeler company, has raised $19.25 million (about Rs 160 crore) in equity funding from Magna and Bajaj Auto Ltd.

articles.title: Sab changa si? RBI MPC minutes suggest India is in a 'Goldilocks' scenario - The Economic Times
articles.description: India's policymakers see a 'Goldilocks scenario' with a 4.5% inflation and 7% growth forecast for FY25, suggesting a balanced economy. The Reserve Bank of India's Monetary Policy Committee agrees on the need for caution amid uncertainties. While optimistic ab…
articles.content: With an inflation and growth forecast of 4.5 per cent and 7 per cent each for FY25, India's policymakers are inferring that the economy is in a 'Goldilocks scenario'. However, economists say they mus… [+3816 chars]

articles.title: Jio Financial Services share price jumps 14% to a record high; market cap crosses ₹2 lakh crore | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Jio Financial Services shares have rallied more than 48% in the past three months and over 40% on a year-to-date (YTD) basis, with its market capitalization crossing  ₹2 lakh crore.
articles.content: Jio Financial Services share price jumped more than 14% to hit a record high intraday on Friday, extending the rally for the fifth consecutive session. Jio Financial shares surged as much as 14.50% t… [+4042 chars]

articles.description: The new Kawasaki Ninja 500 competes against the Aprilia RS457 in India and here's how they compare against each other.
